Detailed Description

Group 20:

Version:
1.1

DESCRIPTION

The following is C code for the teacher robot to perform the task. There are some pre-programmed tasks which can be selected by transferring 1, 2 or 3. The robot can also be controlled manually using the keys A, W, S, D, X. This code runs on Firebid V robot with Zigbee module for wireless communication.

Define Documentation

#define LEFT_MOTOR_SPEED   170

Left motor speed.

#define RIGHT_MOTOR_SPEED   170

Right motor speed.

Function Documentation

void init_usart0 (  )

Function To Initialize USART0 desired baud rate: 9600 actual baud rate: 9600 (error 0.0%) char size: 8 bit parity: Disabled

ISR ( INT5_vect   )

Right interrupt handler. Increase right shaft count

ISR ( INT4_vect   )

Left interrupt handler. Increase left shaft count

int main (  )

Main function. Initialize devices, ports, interrupts and set motor speed.

SIGNAL ( SIG_USART0_RECV   )

Signal to denote that data has been recieved by USART0 (Zigbee). '1'. Perform task 1. '2'. Perform task 2. '3'. Perform task 3. 'w'. Move forward. 's'. Move backward. 'a'. Left turn. 'd'. Right turn. 'x'. Stop. Note: The letters are in lower case

Variable Documentation

Stores recieved charater.

char task1[30] = "40f90r40f90r40f90r40f"

Task1: Square with right turns.

char task2[30] = "35f120r40f120l35f"

Task2: 'Z' motion starting from top left.

char task3[30] = "35f120r35f60l35b"

Task3: Equilateral triangle starting from bottom left.
